page.title: 13Linlithgow Golf Club
page.content: Linlithgow Golf Club was opened in 1913 and at present has 404 senior male,100 junior and 55 female members. Joining fees vary from senior male who pay Â£150 to juniors who pay only Â£30.Membership fees at present are Â£105 for male,Â£21 for junior and Â£50 for female.There are also special rates for senior citizens. Like most golf clubs, Linlithgow has a problem with vandalism.There have been frequent break-ins,the target being the gambling machine,which can hold a considerable amount of money. An annual event in which all members can compete is the Courier Trophy competition. The club employs only 5 people,four of whom are green staff,the other being the club steward.
